value:
I am now the ruler of Crimea. I will
not abandon that role. It is time to
take all challenges in stride.$k$pI will endure anything to build a
better future for my people.

The discontent among the lords and
populace was due to my lack of
experience as a ruler.$k$pI did not have the determination
required of a queen.

I will not allow a single seed of
future trouble to take root in the
present. I will see that effort through.

Two successors—myself and King
Pelleas—found two heroes, Lord
Ike and the Silver-Haired Maiden.$k$pIt is almost unnatural...

War creates despair and hardens
hearts. The Crimean people shall not
be subjected to such horrors again.

You are the esteemed summoner of
this castle, yes? May your fortunes
continue to grow.$k$pOh! My apologies. I come bearing
warm regards from your ally,
$Nf.

May my light bathe the people of
Crimea, and all those who call this
world home, in its warm embrace.

Thank you, everyone. I am indeed the
queen of Crimea, and a queen does
not hide.

I will weep and tremble no longer.
With everyone by my side, I have
no other direction but forward.

Thank you for your concern,
Summoner. I assure you, I am well.

The orphan of the late King Ramon, I
am now queen of Crimea. I'm Elincia,
and together we will chart our future!

I once thought if we could only repel
Crimea's invaders, the kingdom
would return to how it once was.$k$pBut that was not so. The people
buckled under the weight of war, and
lords obsessed over petty squabbles.$k$pCountless wounds inflicted during the
conflict slowly shredded the kingdom
from the inside, leaving it to rot.$k$pFurther, those whose loved ones had
been lost by Daein's hand demanded
revenge, and how could I refuse?$k$pThe Crimea I knew was gone, throne
stained with blood, and yet I was to
rule as queen? I did not want that...$k$pEven so, allowing it to be taken by
someone with a wicked heart instead
would only lead to more pain.$k$pI could not ignore my culpability in
Crimea's suffering. So I pledged the
rest of my life in service to her.$k$pNow, with my ever-loyal retainers at
my side and the people's love at my
back, we will chart out a new future.
Onward.
Onward.
I will stop you.
With my allies beside me!
With my allies beside me!
I will hesitate no longer!
I had further to go...
I am Elincia. Perhaps you have heard of me?
Ah...! Oh, it's you. I wonder if I'll ever get used to you capturing my attention that way.
I was able to come this far because so many people believed in me.
I want to be more diligent in my training. Perhaps my lord Ike will help me.
Instead of cursing one's own powerlessness, it is critical to foster a desire to change and become stronger.
If I could save just one ally, it would mean so much to me.
I have ascended to a new strength. I vow to protect you.
I shall do it.
Where to?
Leave it to me.
